nodes.text: Plea Bargain was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was a stand-alone adventure and was written by Craig Baugh and edited by Ron Heintz and Margaret Heintz.

Echari Di'San, the leader of the Cularin Trade Alliance is falsely accused of murder and the players must find out the truth about what occurred, to free Di'San and save the reputation of the Trade Alliance.
